dcterms:description: A widely-used benchmark dataset that contains 80 thing and 53 stuff classes, involving 118K, 5K, and 20K images for training, validation, and testing, respectively.
dcterms:title: COCO

dcterms:creator: M. Everingham
S. A. Eslami
L. Van Gool
C. K. Williams
J. Winn
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: The PASCAL VOC 2012 dataset contains 20 thing and one background stuff category, augmented with additional annotations from the SBD dataset, resulting in 10582 images.
dcterms:title: VOC 2012

dcterms:creator: M. Cordts
M. Omran
S. Ramos
T. Rehfeld
M. Enzweiler
R. Benenson
U. Franke
S. Roth
B. Schiele
dcterms:description: The Cityscapes dataset consists of 5000 street-view fine annotations with a resolution of 1024 × 2048, divided into training, validation, and testing sets.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes

dcterms:creator: G. Neuhold
T. Ollmann
S. Rota Bulo
P. Kontschieder
dcterms:description: The Mapillary Vistas dataset is a large-scale dataset for semantic understanding of street scenes, containing various resolutions and a diverse set of classes.
dcterms:title: Mapillary Vistas
